commands.name: az mysql flexible-server replica create
commands.summary: Create a read replica for a server.
commands.syntax:
az mysql flexible-server replica create --replica-name
                                        --resource-group
                                        --source-server
                                        [--backup-retention]
                                        [--database-port]
                                        [--geo-redundant-backup {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                        [--iops]
                                        [--location]
                                        [--no-wait]
                                        [--private-dns-zone]
                                        [--public-access {Disabled, Enabled}]
                                        [--sku-name]
                                        [--storage-redundancy {LocalRedundancy, ZoneRedundancy}]
                                        [--storage-size]
                                        [--subnet]
                                        [--tags]
                                        [--tier]
                                        [--vnet]
                                        [--zone]
examples: az mysql flexible-server replica create --replica-name testReplicaServer -g testGroup --source-server testserver --zone 3

commands.name: az mysql flexible-server replica list
commands.summary: List all read replicas for a given server.
examples: az mysql flexible-server replica list -g testGroup -n testserver

commands.name: az mysql flexible-server replica stop-replication
commands.summary: Stop replication to a read replica and make it a read/write server.
examples: az mysql flexible-server replica stop-replication -g testGroup -n testReplicaServer
